name: Justified Season 1
summary:
FX宣布现代西部警匪剧《火线警探》（Justified）将于3月16日播出。 
　　该剧是根据根据2001年Elmore Leonard撰写的小说《Fire In The Hole》改编，讲述美国联邦执法官Raylan Givens（Timothy Olyphant扮演）使用传统方法来解决现代案件的故事。「Justified」这个名字有一定的宗教含义，在神学上指「上帝把人从与滔天罪行相连的惩罚中解脱出来」。 
　　Raylan是个西部牛仔味很浓的警察，永远戴着一顶斯泰森毡帽，穿着一双牛仔靴，屁股上的牛皮枪套里插着一支备用手枪。不到万不得已的时候，他不会使用手枪－－因为一旦他拔出枪来，对手就必须流血。他认为这就是手枪的作用：要么不用，要用就一击必杀。 
　　Raylan在肯塔基州的乡村里出生，在小镇Harlan上长大。在那里，他度过了自己的青涩年代。打球、追女孩子、挖煤，这曾经是他生活的全部。19岁那年，他下决心要当一个联邦警察，于是毅然离开家乡。几年以后，他如愿以偿。正当他准备大展宏图之际，却因在迈阿密一家旅馆射杀持枪匪徒的「意外事件」遭致上司不满。作为对他的惩罚，上司将他调回他发誓再也不回去的家乡－－肯塔基。 
　　Nick Searcy在剧中扮演肯塔基州来克星敦市联邦警察局副警长Art Mullen；Jacob Pitts扮演Raylan的同事Tim Gutterson；Erica Tazel扮演Raylan的同事Rachel Brooks。追踪逃犯、保护证人、运送囚犯是他们的「基本工作」。 
　　回到家乡的Raylan不得不面对那些他并不想见的人：以前一起挖煤的好友Boyd Crowder（Walton Goggins），现在是个抢银行的通缉犯；他读高中时暗恋的啦啦队长Ava Crowder（Joelle Carter），Boyd的妹妹；还有他的前妻Winona（Natalie Zea）。然而Raylan最不愿意见的是他那位以犯罪为生的父亲，Arlo（Raymond Barry）。

eps.name: Fire in the Hole
eps.desc: After some bad publicity involving a shooting, Deputy U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens (Timothy Olyphant) is transferred to Lexington, Kentucky and under Chief Deputy Art Mullen (Nick Searcy), an old friend from the academy, he takes on the case of the murder of a young white supremacist who is linked to a church bombing. The chief suspect is Boyd Crowder (Walton Goggins), a childhood friend of Raylan's. In order to catch him, Raylan returns to his hometown of Harlan, a veritable 21st century Wild West. Boyd gives Raylan an ultimatum: leave Harlan within twenty-four hours or be killed. After a tense confrontation at an ex-girlfriend's house, Raylan gets the drop on Boyd and shoots him in the chest, though he survives and is hospitalized.

eps.name: Riverbrook
eps.desc: Raylan visits Boyd in the prison hospital to check on him, and transport Crowe to prison. Meanwhile, during a 'prison band' performance, convict Douglas Cooper and a fellow inmate escape. After Art Mullen asks Raylan to return to investigate, Raylan makes a stop at a gas station. Unbeknownst to Raylan, the convicts have set a trap, and Cooper makes off with Raylan's guns, car and hat. After learning that Cooper only had three months left on his sentence, Raylan and marshall Gutterson make a trip to Cooper's ex-wife, Shirley. Cooper then visits after and makes a deal with Shirley and Dupree, Shirley's 'cousin'. They are looking for money Cooper hid in the flooring of development housing during construction. After Ava makes a house call to Raylan, he discovers a hunch as to the location of the money. Cooper, however, screwed up the location. After Dupree shoots Cooper, they find the right house, whose occupants have spent it all. A hostage situtation ensues after Cooper helps Raylan find the right house, and Shirley helps Raylan by allowing Gutterson to snipe Dupree, citing that it 'wasn't right' to shoot Cooper. The episode ends with a nice conversation between Cooper and Raylan as they once again leave the prison.
